original_text: So they moved the stone away. Jesus looked up towards the sky. He said, ‘Father, I thank you that you have listened to me.
korean_text: 돌을 옮겨 놓으니 예수께서 눈을 들어 우러러 보시고 이르시되 아버지여 내 말을 들으신 것을 감사하나이다

sentences.original_text: So they moved the stone away.
Jesus looked up towards the sky.
that you have listened to me.'
